= archive-authentication

Shared authorization code for handling user rights on user-generated content and sharing for archive projects at CeDiS.

Archive Authentication expects a User model and attaches all role-relevant models to this.

INSTALLATION:





== 10. Test - run the specs
Go to the gem's directory and run

  +rake spec+

(Assuming you have rspec/rspec_rails installed.)
